comments_on_usage.0: this is to document the JSON
comments_on_usage.1: Hindi File Format From NSDL e-Gov To Printer (PAN card) Version 2.13
comments_on_usage.2: This is Single format file, all rows got same format
comments_on_usage.2.1: For Single format file, in file def - use @@ as file section type FD_SINGLE_FORM_ROWTYPE
comments_on_usage.3: unique_column_value - default same as unique_column if the column is configured in the database section or derived e.g. tx_id
comments_on_usage.3.1: unique_column_value- otherwise is in file_def e.g. n0020_some_name or faster file_def row | index | column name for ex. nd|1|n0020_some_name
